name: Bermud'Island
description:
What is it ?

Bermud'Island is a short puzzle game.

As an explorer, you are looking for a tresor on a lost island in the Bermuda Triangle. You will have to explore and resolve puzzles to access it.
Will you find it ?

Trailer :
Controls :
How to play it ?

Just download and run the exe file. There is possibilities to play with a remote, you have to set up your controls, but if you ask for it we wil add the option to set by default . Notice that we develop this game in two month, so we don't have any idea about minimal specification your computer need.

Who are we ?

We are three french students, we created this game during a school project on the Unreal Engine 4 :

  • Dorian VIDAL : Game Design / Programming / Level Design / Audio / 3D Modeling
  • Marc VIALATTE : Programming / Game Design
  • Yann RAY : Programming / Game Design / Level Design
